channel.title: Server Status List Can't login to bid
channel.description:
When I try to login here - http://www.moparisthebest.com/sponsbid.php with my correct forums login and password it just redirects me to the forum index here - http://www.moparisthebest.com/sponsbid.php
I'm going to need to login and vote pretty soon can an admin assist me or take a look at this? Thanks!

item.description:

Also having this problem, it redirects me to the forum when I login.

item.title: Server Status List Can't login to bid
item.dc:creator: @Zarpor Zarpor
item.description:
@Zarpor wrote:

Apparently by going to http://moparisthebest.com/smf and logging into the forums there it brought me directly to the bidding page, even though it logged me into https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/ when I logged in here - https://www.moparisthebest.com/sponsbid.php

Makes no sense but at least I’m in…
